ml_tags: IN LOVING MEMORY OF Clement Joseph David Solomon Isaiah Solomon "CJ" Died 18th Jan 1977 Aged 69 Years Loving Father of Susan,Joseph and Davinia Dearly loved Husband of Leofua 26 Jan 1999 21 Sept 2022 Beloved Son of Davinia Cherished brother of and Luca Uncle of Leila-Rose Laina and Italya Jovan,Natasha,Laina,Italya David,Jessica,Justin,Clement Peter,Alexandra and Samuel "No longer by our side but forever in our hearts" SOLOMON Grandfather of
